eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray} 
S=-\int\! dtdy \left[
\frac14 F_{\mu\nu}^2 
+\frac{2}{(2\pi\alpha')^2}(\partial_\mu X)^2
+\frac{1}{2}|D_\mu T|^2
-\frac{1}{4 \alpha'} |T|^2 
+\frac{2}{(2\pi\alpha')^2} X^2|T|^2 \right] \ .
\label{T-du}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
S_{\text{fluc}}=-\int\! d^2x 
\left[
\frac{1}{2} (\partial_\mu T)^2 
-\frac{1}{4 \alpha'} T^2+
\frac{2 \tan^2 (\phi /2) y^2}{(2\pi\alpha')^2} T^2 
\right] .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
S=-\int dtdy
\Big(
-\frac{1}{4 \alpha'} T^2 +\frac{1}{2} (\partial_\mu T)^2 
+\displaystyle\frac{1}{2(1+4 \tan^2 (\phi /2))}
[(\partial_y T)^2+4 \tan^2 (\phi /2) y^2 T^2] 
\Big) \ .
\

\begin{eqnarray} 
S=-\int\! dtdy \left[
\frac14 F_{\mu\nu}^2 
+\frac{2}{(2\pi\alpha')^2}(\partial_\mu X)^2
+\frac{1}{2}|D_\mu T|^2

\label{T-du}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
S_{\text{fluc}}=-\int\! d^2x 
\left[
\frac{1}{2} (\partial_\mu T)^2 
-\frac{1}{4 \alpha'} T^2+
\frac{2 \tan^2 (\phi /2) y^2}{(2\pi\alpha')^2} T^2 
\right] .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
S=-\int dtdy
\Big(
-\frac{1}{4 \alpha'} T^2 +\frac{1}{2} (\partial_\mu T)^2
